head.title: Car Linked to Rape Is Found in Brooklyn

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Car Linked to Rape Is Found in Brooklyn

block.p: The stolen rental car that the police said two men used to abduct and rape a 15-year-old girl on Tuesday was found yesterday in Bushwick, a largely residential, high-crime area in north Brooklyn.

Two officers who were handing out sketches of the suspects found the four-door white Toyota Camry just before noon, parked on Bushwick Avenue between Furman and Granite Streets, said a police spokesman, Sgt. Peter Berry. The car and its license plate number, ZNY143, matched the description that the victim had given to the police.
The stolen rental car that the police said two men used to abduct and rape a 15-year-old girl on Tuesday was found yesterday in Bushwick, a largely residential, high-crime area in north Brooklyn.

Two officers who were handing out sketches of the suspects found the four-door white Toyota Camry just before noon, parked on Bushwick Avenue between Furman and Granite Streets, said a police spokesman, Sgt. Peter Berry. The car and its license plate number, ZNY143, matched the description that the victim had given to the police.
The attack is being investigated as a bias incident because the victim, who is white, said her assailants were two black men who said they had chosen her because she was "white and perfect."
